snippet.title: Garden of Wandering Souls - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Garden of Wandering Souls on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3116160/Garden_of_Wandering_Souls/

Garden of Wandering Souls is a tower defense game with rogue-lite elements where you strategize using a random set of cards to prevent lost souls from becoming truly lost.

The Garden is where departed souls linger before reaching their next destination. It is a beautiful and serene realm, but hidden dangers lurk within its maze-like paths. Lingering too long causes souls to gradually lose their memories and identities, and if they fully lose them, they will vanish. Charon is the title bestowed upon those who guide those wandering souls to their next resting place. They must dispatch a tower-like creature called Daimon to escort and protect the souls through the perilous Garden by absorbing the souls toward them.
